# blacktools.ai - Technical Documentation

> Last updated: December 2024

> blacktools.ai is an AI video generation platform for creating UGC-style marketing videos. The platform combines advanced text-to-video generation, video synthesis, and proprietary lip-sync technology with a library of 300+ AI avatars supporting 30+ languages.

## Technology

### AI Capabilities

**Text-to-Video Generation**
Converts natural language descriptions into video content.

**Video Synthesis**
Creates realistic visual output supporting multiple styles and formats.

**LipSync Engine (Proprietary)**
Audio-visual synchronization system matching lip movements to speech. Supports 30+ languages with phoneme-level accuracy.

**Voice Synthesis**
Text-to-speech with 100+ natural-sounding voices across 30+ languages.

### Video Generation
- AI UGC Generator: User-generated content style videos
